section.title: Repo Studio Overview
section.para: Repo Studio provides a platform to manage Linux system and application deployment. Repo Studio works with CentOS, a stable, free and widely-adopted version of Linux, and Red Hat Enterprise Linux, the commercial operating system from which CentOS is derived.

Repo Studio assembles software, customizations and, optionally, installation images, into a standard deployment format, a YUM package repository. YUM package repositories, called repositories throughout this document, can be used to test, deploy and maintain systems and applications across a wide variety of IT environments.
Using Repo Studio you can create and maintain repositories:

listitem.para: select input repositories including a base operating system repository and additional package repositories,
select packages and groups to include,
build additional packages containing client machine configuration, customization scripts, and custom applications,
build a system or package repository,

section.para: In summary, Repo Studio is a production life cycle manager for use in deploying Linux systems and applications.
